description: The tool doesn't start right after installation on Fedora 32. Also the project website is inaccessible, so there is no chance to check the current status, open issues or to report this problem. Please try to install this tool anyway, as I hope for these issues to only be temporary.
summary: Does not start. Project website inaccessible

description: I am using Fedora 33 with kernel version 5.9.10 and the application is really slow when adding books, and sometime hangs. It also crashes frequently when just using it in general.
Installed and opened but hangs when trying to add a new book.

Interesante biblioteca libre . Sin embargo, ¿sería posible que se importen archivos de otras bibliotecas como anobii con archivos .csv o archivos .xls? 

¡Gracias!
